June 15, 1985 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A) 500 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmen-s-festival-class-a

Spectrum [Vinter]
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK 'A Frontier Overture' - Bruce Broughton: 1 St Austell, 188 2 Message Maker, 185 3 Redruth, 182
Best player: Terry Sleeman, euphonium, St Austell
Special Awards Best Soprano: Paul Bilkey, Redruth Best Solo Cornet: Paul Richards, St. Austell Best Euphonium: Terry Sleeman, St. Austell Best Solo Horn: Mandy Phillips, Message Maker Best Set of Basses: St. Austell
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Karen Squibb, Graham Sibley
Deportment (judge WO Roberts): 1 Bugle (Class B) 2 Hatherleigh (Class C)
